languages.text: "Если позволите, перейду сразу к делу. После атаки на Даргонус я попытался выяснить, каким образом ксеносам удался этот чудовищный налет. Разузнать, что врагам Человечества помогала некая тайная ячейка. Мои агенты потратили немало времени на выслеживание и допросы вражеских лазутчиков на Даргонусе и прочих колониях фон Валанциус. Результат меня... мягко говоря, удивил". {n}Ахиллеас прерывается, чтобы приложить респиратор к обожженным губам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Если позволите, перейду сразу к делу. После атаки на Даргонус я попытался выяснить, каким образом ксеносам удался этот чудовищный налет. Разузнать, что врагам Человечества помогала некая тайная ячейка. Мои агенты потратили немало времени на выслеживание и допросы вражеских лазутчиков на Даргонусе и прочих колониях фон Валанциус. Результат меня... мягко говоря, удивил". {n}Ахиллеас прерывается, чтобы приложить респиратор к обожженным губам.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: "If I may, I will get right to the point. After the attack on Dargonus, I focused my efforts on trying to discover how the xenos were able to launch that devastating raid. According to my findings, the enemies of Humanity received assistance from a hidden cell of conspirators. My agents spent a great deal of time tracking and interrogating infiltrators on Dargonus and other von Valancius colonies. The results... surprised me, to say the least." {n}Achilleas pauses to press his respirator against his burnt lips.{/n}

languages.text: « Si vous me le permettez, j'irai droit au but. Après l'attaque de Dargonus, j'ai tenté de comprendre comment les xénos avaient pu lancer un assaut d'une telle ampleur. D'après ce que j'ai pu découvrir, les ennemis de l'humanité ont bénéficié de l'aide d'une cellule secrète de conspirateurs. Mes hommes n'ont pas ménagé leur peine pour traquer et interroger les agents infiltrés sur Dargonus et dans les autres colonies von Valancius. Et les résultats ont été pour le moins... surprenants. » {n}Achilleas s'interrompt pour plaquer son respirateur sur ses lèvres brûlées.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If I may, I will get right to the point. After the attack on Dargonus, I focused my efforts on trying to discover how the xenos were able to launch that devastating raid. According to my findings, the enemies of Humanity received assistance from a hidden cell of conspirators. My agents spent a great deal of time tracking and interrogating infiltrators on Dargonus and other von Valancius colonies. The results... surprised me, to say the least." {n}Achilleas pauses to press his respirator against his burnt lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Si vous me le permettez, j'irai droit au but. Après l'attaque de Dargonus, j'ai tenté de comprendre comment les xénos avaient pu lancer un assaut d'une telle ampleur. D'après ce que j'ai pu découvrir, les ennemis de l'humanité ont bénéficié de l'aide d'une cellule secrète de conspirateurs. Mes agents n'ont pas ménagé leur peine pour traquer et interroger les agents infiltrés sur Dargonus et dans les autres colonies von Valancius. Et les résultats ont été pour le moins... surprenants. » {n}Achilleas s'interrompt pour plaquer son respirateur sur ses lèvres brûlées.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: “如果可以的话，请允许我开门见山地说明。在达戈努斯的那场袭击过后，我进行了详细调查，终于弄清楚那些异形是如何发动了那场毁灭性的袭击。调查结果显示，人类之敌得到了一群秘密阴谋分子的协助。我的特工花了很长时间追踪、审问达戈努斯与王朝其他殖民地的通敌分子，结果……老实说，让我相当吃惊。”{n}阿吉里亚斯顿了顿，将呼吸器压在烧坏的嘴唇上。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If I may, I will get right to the point. After the attack on Dargonus, I focused my efforts on trying to discover how the xenos were able to launch that devastating raid. According to my findings, the enemies of Humanity received assistance from a hidden cell of conspirators. My agents spent a great deal of time tracking and interrogating infiltrators on Dargonus and other von Valancius colonies. The results... surprised me, to say the least." {n}Achilleas pauses to press his respirator against his burnt lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如果可以的话，请允许我开门见山地说明。在达戈努斯的那场袭击过后，我进行了详细调查，终于弄清楚那些异形是如何发动了那场毁灭性的袭击。调查结果显示，人类之敌得到了一群秘密阴谋分子的协助。我的特工花了很长时间追踪、审问达戈努斯与王朝其他殖民地的通敌分子，结果……老实说，让我相当吃惊。”{n}阿吉里亚斯顿了顿，将呼吸器压在烧坏的嘴唇上。{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: 「本題に入らせていただきます。ダルゴナスへの攻撃のあと、私は異種族がどうやってあの壊滅的な襲撃を行うことができたのかを解明することに注力しました。私の調査によりますと、人類の敵は共謀者の秘密下部組織から援助を受けていました。私の諜報員達は、時間をかけてダルゴナスや他のフォン・ヴァランシウスのコロニーの潜伏者たちを追跡し、尋問しました。その結果は…控えめに言っても驚くべきものでした」{n}アキレアスは焼けただれた唇に呼吸器を押し当てた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If I may, I will get right to the point. After the attack on Dargonus, I focused my efforts on trying to discover how the xenos were able to launch that devastating raid. According to my findings, the enemies of Humanity received assistance from a hidden cell of conspirators. My agents spent a great deal of time tracking and interrogating infiltrators on Dargonus and other von Valancius colonies. The results... surprised me, to say the least." {n}Achilleas pauses to press his respirator against his burnt lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「本題に入らせていただきます。ダルゴナスへの攻撃のあと、私は異種族がどうやってあの壊滅的な襲撃を行うことができたのかを解明することに注力しました。私の調査によりますと、人類の敵は共謀者の秘密下部組織から援助を受けていました。私の諜報員達は、時間をかけてダルゴナスや他のフォン・ヴァランシウスのコロニーの潜伏者たちを追跡し、尋問しました。その結果は…控えめに言っても驚くべきものでした」{n}アキレアスは焼けただれた唇に呼吸器を押し当てた。{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: "Falls Ihr gestattet, komme ich gleich zum Punkt. Nach dem Angriff auf Dargonus wollte ich herauszufinden, wie es den Xenos gelang, ihren verheerenden Überfall durchzuführen. Nach meinen Erkenntnissen wurden die Feinde der Menschheit von einer verborgenen Zelle von Verschwörern unterstützt. Meine Agenten verbrachten viel zeit damit, die Eindringlinge auf Dargonus und anderen Valancius-Kolonien aufzuspüren und dann zu verhören. Von den Ergebnissen ... war ich, gelinde gesagt, überrascht." {n}Achilleas hält inne und drückt seinen Respirator auf seine verbrannten Lippen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If I may, I will get right to the point. After the attack on Dargonus, I focused my efforts on trying to discover how the xenos were able to launch that devastating raid. According to my findings, the enemies of Humanity received assistance from a hidden cell of conspirators. My agents spent a great deal of time tracking and interrogating infiltrators on Dargonus and other von Valancius colonies. The results... surprised me, to say the least." {n}Achilleas pauses to press his respirator against his burnt lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Falls Ihr gestattet, komme ich gleich zum Kern der Sache. Nach dem Angriff auf Dargonus wollte ich herauszufinden, wie es den Xenos gelang, ihren verheerenden Überfall durchzuführen. Nach meinen Erkenntnissen wurden die Feinde der Menschheit von einer verborgenen Zelle von Verschwörern unterstützt. Meine Agenten verbrachten viel zeit damit, die Eindringlinge auf Dargonus und anderen Valancius-Kolonien aufzuspüren und dann zu verhören. Von den Ergebnissen ... war ich, gelinde gesagt, überrascht." {n}Achilleas hält inne und drückt seinen Respirator auf seine verbrannten Lippen.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: «Con su permiso, iré al grano. Tras el ataque a Dargonus, centré mis esfuerzos en averiguar cómo pudieron los xenos lanzar una ofensiva tan devastadora. Según mis pesquisas, los enemigos de la Humanidad recibieron ayuda de un grupo clandestino de conspiradores. Mis agentes pasaron mucho tiempo rastreando e interrogando al personal infiltrado en Dargonus y otras colonias de los von Valancius. Los resultados fueron... sorprendentes, y me quedo corto». {n}Achilleas hace una pausa para presionar la mascarilla respiradora contra sus labios quemados.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If I may, I will get right to the point. After the attack on Dargonus, I focused my efforts on trying to discover how the xenos were able to launch that devastating raid. According to my findings, the enemies of Humanity received assistance from a hidden cell of conspirators. My agents spent a great deal of time tracking and interrogating infiltrators on Dargonus and other von Valancius colonies. The results... surprised me, to say the least." {n}Achilleas pauses to press his respirator against his burnt lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Con su permiso, iré al grano. Tras el ataque a Dargonus, centré mis esfuerzos en averiguar cómo pudieron los xenos lanzar una ofensiva tan devastadora. Según mis pesquisas, los enemigos de la Humanidad recibieron ayuda de un grupo clandestino de conspiradores. Mis agentes pasaron mucho tiempo rastreando e interrogando al personal infiltrado en Dargonus y otras colonias de los von Valancius. Los resultados fueron... sorprendentes, y me quedo corto». {n}Achilleas hace una pausa para presionar la mascarilla respiradora contra sus labios quemados.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: "Müsaadenizle hemen konuya gireceğim. Dargonus saldırısı sonrasında çalışmalarımı, zenoların böylesi büyük bir tahribat yaratan bir baskını nasıl gerçekleştirebildiğini keşfetmeye odakladım. Bulgularım gösteriyor ki İnsanlığın düşmanları, gizli bir komplocu hücresinden yardım almış. Ajanlarım, Dargonus'a ve diğer von Valancius kolonilerine sızanların izini sürmeye ve sorgulamaya epey bir zaman ayırdı. Sonuçlar beni, en hafif tabirle şaşırttı." {n}Achilleas, solunum cihazını yanmış dudaklarına bastırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If I may, I will get right to the point. After the attack on Dargonus, I focused my efforts on trying to discover how the xenos were able to launch that devastating raid. According to my findings, the enemies of Humanity received assistance from a hidden cell of conspirators. My agents spent a great deal of time tracking and interrogating infiltrators on Dargonus and other von Valancius colonies. The results... surprised me, to say the least." {n}Achilleas pauses to press his respirator against his burnt lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Müsaadenizle hemen konuya gireceğim. Dargonus saldırısı sonrasında çalışmalarımı, zenoların böylesi büyük bir tahribat yaratan bir baskını nasıl gerçekleştirebildiğini keşfetmeye odakladım. Bulgularım gösteriyor ki İnsanlığın düşmanları, gizli bir komplocu hücresinden yardım almış. Ajanlarım Dargonus'a ve diğer von Valancius kolonilerine sızanların izini sürmeye ve sorgulamaya önemli zaman ayırdı. Sonuçlar beni, en hafif tabirle, şaşırttı." {n}Achilleas solunum cihazını yanmış dudaklarına bastırıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr
